pm-menu.privacy-policy: {bot} Privacy Policy: This bot was designed and created to guarantee your security and privacy. Thank you for your trust, our organization values â€‹â€‹protecting your data and, moreover, we value quality. The current privacy policy can be updated at any time, but this change will be communicated days in advance on the news channel.
pm-menu.privacy-policyRead: Information that this bot collects: - Basic User Information: User ID, First Name, Last Name, Language and Username. - Basic Group Information: Chat ID, Chat Title, Username and Chat Type. - BOT Settings: Things like your Chat Language with the bot and any other settings will be collected. How and why is this information collected? This information can be captured by decorators, 'little pieces' that when you interact with the bot, it can save this basic information, whether it's a direct message or not. In this case, this information can be collected to improve the experience and functionality of the service provided by the bot. Note: All the information collected is public and available for use on Telegram, but we don't know your 'REAL' identity.

reason.weatherNotProvided: The location was not provided to me. Usage: /weather (location)
